tasks.label: build-tui
tasks.command: gcc -Wall -O2 main_interactive.c ui_ncurses.c glyphs.c data.c astronomy.c festivals.c calendar.c -lncursesw -lm -o celtic_calendar_tui && gcc -Wall -O2 deco_beta_version/main_interactive.c deco_beta_version/ui_ncurses.c deco_beta_version/glyphs.c data.c astronomy.c festivals.c calendar.c -lncursesw -lm -o celtic_calendar_tui_beta

tasks.label: build-tui
tasks.command: gcc -Wall -O2 -I. main_interactive.c ui_ncurses.c glyphs.c data.c astronomy.c festivals.c calendar.c -lncursesw -lm -o celtic_calendar_tui && gcc -Wall -O2 -I. deco_beta_version/main_interactive.c deco_beta_version/ui_ncurses.c deco_beta_version/glyphs.c data.c astronomy.c festivals.c calendar.c -lncursesw -lm -o celtic_calendar_tui_beta
